#summary Method typeBasicInfoByTypeID details

= /typeBasicInfoByTypeID/(typeID) =

Item type basic information for given typeID.

== Attributes ==

|| graphicIcon || String ||
|| itemCategoryID || Number ||
|| itemTypeID || Number ||
|| name || String ||
